title: Clearview (Highway Signage) Article From the New York Times
content:
Apologies if this has already been posted, but I stumbled upon [this article](http://web.archive.org/web/20120610181051/http:/www.nytimes.com/2007/08/12/magazine/12fonts-t.html?pagewanted=1&ei=5070&en=61082b31529bc061&ex=1187668800&emc=eta1) recently in The New York Times and I thought you all might find this interesting. Particularly students, or those interested in information design, and environmental graphics/typography.

James Montalbano, a Typophile frequenter is featured in this article. A great article! On a somewhat personal note, James and Don are to a large degree partially responsible for my interest in typography and information design. Congrats guys! I wish you continued success!
author: TBiddy
